reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the improvement of Public Sector Accounting Standards in Indonesia

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK expertise through a Government Auditors & Finance Officer capacity building programme in International Public Sector Accounting Standards. This will improve transparency, reduce corruption and enhance the prospects for companies in public procurement and infrastructure projects by aligning public sector accounting in Indonesia with international and UK standards.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
